person.content:

Paragraph: NYMEX said an estimated 35,662 Hub contracts traded , down from Thursday 's revised tally of 43,955 .

| Thursday |

Note: "NYMEX" and "Thursday" are both entities in the paragraph, but they are not people. "NYMEX" is an organization and "Thursday" is a day of the week.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with only the entities that clearly refer to a person:

| Person |
| --- |
| None |

The paragraph does not mention any person.
